甔字的基本解释

甔
dān
坛子一类的瓦器：酒甔。

甔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
［《廣韻》丁含切，平覃，端。］
［《廣韻》都濫切，去闞，端。］
亦作“瓭2”。
陶制罂类容器。亦用作量词。《史记·货殖列传》：“漿千甔。”裴駰集解引徐广曰：“大罌缶。”唐陆龟蒙《京口与友生话别》诗：“國計徒盈策，家儲不滿甔。”续范亭《饯雁》诗：“寒藻清泉酒一甔，客中餞雁笑予憨。”一说为小甖。见《玉篇·瓦部》。

甔字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　甔； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页752第18
【廣韻】丁含切【集韻】【韻會】都含切，?音耽。【集韻】罃也。【揚子·方言】齊東北海岱之閒謂之甔。【五音集韻】大甖可受一石。【史記·貨殖傳】醬千甔。【註】徐廣曰：大罌缶。○按《玉篇》《韻會》《正韻》以爲小甖，與諸解異。　又【集韻】通作儋。【前漢·蒯通傳】守儋石之祿。【註】應劭曰：受二斛。又【揚雄傳】家無儋石之儲。【註】孟康曰：儋石，甖石。甖受一石，故云儋石。　又【韻會】通作擔。【揚子·法言】吾見擔石矣。【後漢·明帝紀】生者無擔石之儲。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?都濫切，音擔。又【集韻】覩敢切，音膽。又叉濫切，音?。義?同。

甔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
甔字的起名意思

暂无。

Ren
Basic explanation of words
Ren
dān
Pottery such as jars: Jiu Neng.
Ren
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dān］
["Guangyun" Ding Hanqie, Pingtan, Duan. ]
["Guangyun" all cut indiscriminately, go to Kan, end. ]
Also known as "Jun 2".
Earthenware poppy container. Also used as a quantifier. "Historical Records · Commemorative Biographies of Huo Shi": "Jian Qian Nun." Pei Qi Ji quotation Xu Guang said: "Big Papiao Fou." Tang Lu Guimeng's "Farewell to Yousheng and Jingkou" poem: "The state's plan is to make a profit, and the family is dissatisfied with it. "Continued Fan Ting's poem "Candied Wild Goose": "Hanzao Qingquan wine is a nun, and the candied goose smiles in the guest." One said it was Xiaoyong. See "Yu Pian·Wa Bu".
Ren
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Wa Word Department] 　甔; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 752 18
[Guang Yun] Ding Hanqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] All contain cutting, and the sound will be delayed. 【Ji Yun】Feng Ye. [Yangtze Dialect] Qi Dongbei Haidai's leisure is called Zhinian. [Five-tone collection rhyme] Big poppy can be affected by one stone. 【Historical Records · Commodity Legend】Jiang Thousand Nun. [Note] Xu Guang said: Big Poppy Fou. ○According to "Yu Pian", "Rhyme Meeting" and "Zheng Yun", I think Xiaoyong is different from Zhujie.　[Jiyun] All in all. [Previous Han·Kuitong Biography] Shou the Lu of Danshi. [Note] Ying Shao said: Shou Erhu. And [Yang Xiong's Biography] The family has no reserve for stone. [Note] Meng Kang said: Danshi, poppy stone. The poppy is affected by a stone, so the cloud is a stone.　[Rhyme Club] It's all a burden. 【Yangtze·Fayan】I see the burden of stone. [Later Han·Ming Emperor Ji] The living has no burden of stone reserves.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? They are all over-cutting, and the sound is shouldered. Also 【Jiyun】Dare to cut, sound gall. It's slashing again, the sound?. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Nothing.
dān
сущ.
1) гончарный сосуд, амфора (в один 石 дань)
2) кувшин
